statements: SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT username, event_description FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, username, ip_address FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_description, query_text FROM audit_log WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_description FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT query_text, username FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM audit_log ORDER BY username;
SELECT event_description, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM audit_log GROUP BY event_description HAVING total_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Audit_Log;
SELECT event_description, event_time, event_type FROM Audit_Log ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM Audit_Log WHERE event_type='Login';
SELECT event_time, event_description FROM Audit_Log WHERE event_time > '2021-10-01';
SELECT threat_description, threat_level FROM Security_Threats WHERE threat_level='High';
SELECT * FROM Audit_Log WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT id, event_time, event_description FROM Audit_Log WHERE id = '123456';
SELECT threat_description, threat_level FROM Security_Threats WHERE threat_level = 'Critical' ORDER BY threat_id ASC;
SELECT event_time, event_type FROM Audit_Log WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%' AND event_type = 'Security' LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_description FROM Audit_Log WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_time > '2022-01-01' AND event_time < '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities;
SELECT activity_type, user_id, activity_date FROM auditing_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_description FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM auditing_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(activity_date) AS latest_activity_date FROM auditing_activities;
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_type, user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM auditing_activities GROUP BY activity_type, user_id HAVING total_activities > 1;
SELECT * FROM security_threats WHERE threat_level >= 3 ORDER BY detected_date ASC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_date, user_id, details FROM security_logs WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM auditing_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Data Modification');
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, activity FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT id, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, activity FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, description, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY severity DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, threat_type, status FROM threat_detection WHERE status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, details FROM audit_logs WHERE activity LIKE '%information%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_log;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity FROM user_activity_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_text, ip_address FROM query_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT resource, action FROM access_log WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity, timestamp FROM user_activity_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT ip_address, query_text FROM query_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 456 ORDER BY ip_address;
SELECT username, timestamp, success FROM login_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, resource, action, timestamp FROM access_log WHERE action IN ('READ', 'WRITE') ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC;
